title: Ep. 182 Why Stocks Are Going Much Higher
itunes:title: Why Stocks Are Going Much Higher
description: Mark Minervini, expert trader says don’t fight the trend, he says stocks will move higher in the short-term. Paul Mampilly, research analyst and founder of Capuchinomics, also sees stocks shooting higher. He explains why more cash will flow into the equity market at least over the next 12 months.
